samples.description: Contains sample scripts and other assets that are not render-pipeline specific. You must import these before importing any of the below.
Contains sample prefabs, shaders and materials for the Universal Render Pipeline. Please make sure you also import the "Samples (Shared)" assets too.
Contains a HTC Vive Tracker profile for OpenXR use, and a TrackerInput script for handling the HTC VIVE Tracker on PCVR and the Wrist Tracker on VIVE Focus 3 Natively
